description: The HpeComponentUpdateEntry resource describes a software or firmware component information and update status.

enumDescriptions.Pending: Update is pending and has not started.
enumDescriptions.Exception: Update has stopped due to an exception condition.
enumDescriptions.Stopping: Update is in the process of stopping.
enumDescriptions.Running as a Service: Update now running as a service.

enumLongDescriptions.Pending: This value shall represent that the update is pending some condition and has not yet begun to execute.
enumLongDescriptions.In Progress: This value shall represent that the update is ongoing.
enumLongDescriptions.Suspended: This value shall represent that the update has been suspended but is expected to restart and is therefore not complete.
enumLongDescriptions.Completed: This value shall represent that the update completed successfully or with warnings.
enumLongDescriptions.Exception: This value shall represent that the update completed with errors.
enumLongDescriptions.Killed: This value shall represent that the update is complete because an operator killed it.
enumLongDescriptions.Newly Created: This value shall represent that the update is newly created, but has not started.
enumLongDescriptions.Interrupted: This value shall represent that the update has been interrupted but is expected to restart and is therefore not complete.
enumLongDescriptions.Stopping: This value shall represent that the update is stopping but is not yet complete.
enumLongDescriptions.Running as a Service: This value shall represent that the update is now running as a service and expected to continue operation until stopped or killed.

title: #HpeComponentUpdateEntry.v1_0_1.HpeComponentUpdateEntry
